description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for AWS MSK (Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka) clusters. Tracks broker health, topic throughput, partition replication, consumer lag, and AWS-specific resource metrics.
name: aws-msk
title: AWS MSK Cluster Monitoring

24a74ad1-ddcd-479a-b039-a73c02a869ad.name: deployment.environment
24a74ad1-ddcd-479a-b039-a73c02a869ad.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kafka.consumer.fetch_manager.records_lag'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`
ORDER BY `deployment.environment` ASC

c26e3676-1e18-4771-9727-d62872013f26.name: kafka.cluster.name
c26e3676-1e18-4771-9727-d62872013f26.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'kafka.cluster.name') AS `kafka.cluster.name`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kafka.broker.cpu.usage'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `kafka.cluster.name`
ORDER BY `kafka.cluster.name` ASC

fc44ff57-e496-4f43-a6b2-2e4e17adef88.name: broker.id
fc44ff57-e496-4f43-a6b2-2e4e17adef88.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'broker.id') AS `broker.id`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kafka.broker.cpu.usage'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `broker.id`
ORDER BY `broker.id` ASC

widgets.description: CPU utilization percentage per MSK broker instance
widgets.title: Broker CPU Usage

widgets.description: Memory utilization percentage per MSK broker instance
widgets.title: Broker Memory Usage

widgets.description: Network traffic in bytes per second, split by ingress and egress direction per broker
widgets.title: Network Traffic In/Out

widgets.description: Disk utilization percentage per MSK broker instance
widgets.title: Broker Disk Usage

widgets.description: Rate of disk I/O throughput (read + write) in bytes per second per broker
widgets.title: Disk Throughput (Network I/O Rate)

widgets.description: Rate of messages produced into topics per second
widgets.title: Messages In/s

widgets.description: Rate of messages consumed from topics per second
widgets.title: Messages Out/s

widgets.description: Incoming byte rate per topic in bytes per second
widgets.title: Bytes In/s

widgets.description: Outgoing byte rate per topic in bytes per second
widgets.title: Bytes Out/s

widgets.description: Number of partitions where replicas are not fully in sync with the leader. Non-zero values indicate replication problems.
widgets.title: Under-Replicated Partitions

widgets.description: Number of in-sync replicas per partition. Dropping ISR count signals potential data loss risk.
widgets.title: Partition ISR Count

widgets.description: Total number of partitions across all topics per broker
widgets.title: Partition Count

widgets.description: Consumer group lag measured as the number of records behind the latest offset per consumer group and topic
widgets.title: Consumer Lag

widgets.description: Consumer fetch rate indicating how frequently consumers are polling for new records. A dropping fetch rate may indicate consumer failures.
widgets.title: Consumer Fetch Rate (Error Proxy)

widgets.description: AWS CPU credit usage for burstable MSK broker instances (t-type). High credit consumption indicates sustained high CPU load.
widgets.title: CPU Credit Usage

widgets.description: AWS burst balance percentage for burstable MSK instances. When balance reaches zero, instance CPU is throttled to baseline.
widgets.title: Burst Balance

widgets.description: Combined network I/O rate across all brokers, showing aggregate cluster-level ingress and egress throughput
widgets.title: Network I/O (Cluster Aggregate)
